mapper.select: select a.id as id, a.title as title, a.content as content, t.id as type_id, a.author_id as author_id, a.publish_time as publish_time, a.modify_time as modify_time, a.status as satus, a.enable_comment as enable_comment, a.img as img from t_article a,t_user u,t_type t where a.user_id=u.id and a.type_id=t.id
